COMMENT_TX: ej,miled801,M,buckc901,Balls and strikes Reds Manager Dave Miley ejected by HP umpire CB Bucknor for arguing a strike call on Casey
umpchange,6,ump3b,reilm901 umpchange,6,ump2b,(None) $3B umpire Chuck Meriwether left game with food poisoning
$Cubs Manager Dusty Baker intended to flip these two players in the batting order but failed to tell the umpires

ej,baked002,M,buckc901,Batting out of order call $Ramon Martinez led off the inning with a double and then the Reds protested that the Cubs were batting out of order; Kent Mercker, the proper batter, was called out; Dusty Baker argued with the umpires but was told that the call stood; yelling and screaming, he tossed his lineup card on the ground and was ejected by HP umpire CB Bucknor; Baker threw his hat away, walked away and returned; he tossed his hat again, stomped to the dugout and kicked some items in the on deck cirle before finally leaving the field
$Kerry Wood waved in disgust at HP umpire Eric Cooper who started towards the mound but was stopped by catcher Michael Barrett
ej,woodk002,P,coope901,Balls and strikes $Wood sprinted to the plate and screamed at Cooper and was ejected; Wood threw a batting helmet and gloves out of the dugout

ej,ceder001,P,reedr901,Checked swing $second pitch check swing called strike by 3B umpire Alfonzo Marquez; Ronny Cedeno argued with HP umpire Rick Reed and then smacked his bat on the plate, breaking it; he was ejected by Reed; Cedeno started for the dugout, returned and sprayed him with whatever was in his mouth
ej,mattg001,C,joycj901,Balls and strikes Cubs coach Gary Matthews ejected by HP umpire Jim Joyce
ej,baked002,M,brinj901,Throwing at Jim Edmonds ej,zambc001,P,brinj901,Throwing at Jim Edmonds Carlos Zambrano and Manager Dusty Baker ejected by HP umpire Joe Brinkman
ej,hawkl001,P,tscht901,Balls and strikes LaTroy Hawkins ejected by HP umpire Tim Tschida while leaving game

$SS Nomar Garciaparra took the throw, dragging his foot across the bag before throwing to 1B; 2B umpire Bruce Froemming called Terrence Long safe, precipitating an argument from Cubs manager Dusty Baker
ej,rothl101,C,timmt901,Balls and strikes Cubs coach Larry Rothschild ejected by HP umpire Tim Timmons
ej,aloum001,P,drakr901,Call at 1B Moises Alou ejected by 1B umpire Rob Drake
ej,yoste001,M,wegnm901,Fair/foul call Brewers Manager Ned Yost ejected by 1B umpire Mark Wegner for arguing the fair ball which landed on the line
ej,wheed001,P,meric901,intentional HBP ej,garnp001,M,meric901,Intentional HBP Dan Wheeler and Manager Phil Garner ejected by HP umpire Chuck Meriwether

$Grieve caught Wilkerson's ball against the ivy; he hit the left side of his face on the wall and the ivy and drew blood near his left eye; he was taken to the hospital for x-rays on his left shoulder; Grieve was playing in place of Sosa who was out with bursitis in his right hip
